response.overview: A teenage girl is captured by a giant mutated squid-like creature that appears from Seoul's Han River after toxic waste was dumped in it, prompting her family into a frantic search for her.
response.tagline: HER BIRTH WAS AN ACCIDENT, AND SO WAS HER DEATH.
response.title: The Host

results.name: Mark Kermode reviews Bong Joon-ho's The Host
